bibl.title: Facts from Fragments.
bibl.note: A version of this paper was read to the CUCD meeting in Cambridge in January 1981; a summary has appeared in CUCD Bulletin 10 (1981) pp. 7-8. - Bilan des apports récents de la papyrologie à la connaissance des littératures grecque et latine.
bibl.seg: Parsons Peter J., Facts from Fragments.

A version of this paper was read to the CUCD meeting in Cambridge in January 1981; a summary has appeared in CUCD Bulletin 10 (1981) pp. 7-8. - Bilan des apports récents de la papyrologie à la connaissance des littératures grecque et latine.
